title: How do I get the emoji icon out of the Messaging app text box?
content: In this photo, the emoji icon in the Text Message box was never there before the last software update; and now, there doesn't seem to be a way to get rid of it. How can I turn this emoji OFF? If I need emojis, when I'm testing, I can always access them from the keyboard app.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3a
